title: Has anyone else had an alarming number of other players DC during match
body: The last week or so around 30-40% of my matches have had one or more dc on one of the teams, so im just wondering weather this is normal for the OCE sever or have i been moved into some kind of low priority que or maybe just low ban rates from afking and if anyone else is being effected.

replies.body:
>im just wondering weather this
>weather

lol

Yeah, this sounds normal. Also, prisoners island is not something Riot want to implement, and if they did then they wouldn't do so secretively. They'd let players know why their games have suddenly become less populated.
